ValidationRule.description: UnregCP true then cannot edit checkbox as false.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
$Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", Channel_Partner_From_CP_Portal__c = false,
AND(PRIORVALUE(Unregistered_Channel_Partner__c), true, ISCHANGED(Unregistered_Channel_Partner__c)), $Label.Disable_all_validations_from_booking == "false" /*Added by Prashant to control disabling all validations together*/ )
